newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Harbinger started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Harbinger started at buy.

text.p: -- Robertson, Stephens & Co said its analyst Cathy Baker has started coverage of Harbinger Corp, as provider of electronic commerce software and services, with a buy rating.
-- In a written statement, Baker said the company is "especially adept" at serving small- and mid-size clients, and the market for those customers is "vast" and "untapped."
-- She anticipates 40 percent internal growth in 1997/1998. Her 12-month price target is $35.00. She expects the company to earn $0.56/shr in 1997 and $0.87/shr in 1998.
-- Harbinger shares were up 1-1/4 at 23-1/2 by mid-afternoon.
